message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I'm confident you'll find it a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $1500000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. To better align with my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get closer to my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1300000.
I understand your position, Alice. To further explore the possibility of a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1250000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your latest offer, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. I'm counteroffering at $1350000.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I am willing to increase my counteroffer to $1300000 in hopes of reaching a fair agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. However, I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $1320000.
I'm grateful for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1310000.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'm counteroffering at $1290000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering all the negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1285000.
